title: ATTACHMENTS
content: i have thurderbird 78.14.0 at windows 7 Until 1 month ago when I forwarded emails with attachments these attachments remained at the new email I created. Now that doesn't happen anymore and it makes it very difficult for me. I must fix it and make it as it was asap. When i forward an email with attachments ( .jpg - .pdf - .xls and so on) i need these attachaments to remain also at the new email. Please , i need help !!! There is only 1 email that i forwarded and the 2 attachments remained. I have tested to forward older and newest emails with attachments but no luck, the problem remains.
creator: info8820

title: Adding address from address book to template
content:
I asked this a couple of years ago and got a solution that worked. "This must be easy to do but I can't find an answer. I have a template, I open the template, how to I add an address from the address book to send the message. All my searches give answers on how to save templates and how to open a template, but not an answer on this question." Solution: Try opening the compose window and then use the view menu. Or press F9. Either will work.

This worked great until one of the latest updates and now I don't have the address book on the side menu and I'm back to the same problem of NOT being able to select an address from the address book to add to a template email.
creator: kidzrback

title: Cannot send emails from Thunderbird, except from my Default one
content: Hello, I have 5 email addresses - four I use regularly: TalkTalk1 (Default) and 2, Free-online and Googlemail (haven't upgraded to gmail), and one I haven't for ages (YahooMail). I cannot send emails from any, except from my TalkTalk(TT) default one. I have updated the TalkTalk new Outgoing server settings to the best of my ability, for TalkTalk2 (TT2), Free-online (FOL) and Googlemail (GM) - I can send screenshots for each if necessary: - Server names: all smtp.domain name.net, except FOL: relay.free-online.net (verified on several google searches) - Outgoing port: all changed to 587 - Connection security: all STARTTTLS - Authentication method: all 'Normal password' (I am assuming these would be the same as the ones in the saved login passwords section of Privacy & Security, except for GM which has Incoming server authentication OAuth2 but a normal password in the saved login Passwords) - User name: my email addresses, except for FOL: my name Details: Email providers: TalkTalk, Free-online (Plusnet), Googlemail ISP: Talktalk.net Operating system: MacOS Catalina 10.15.7 Thunderbird version: 102.8.0 Many thanks for your help, it is now the 8th day I spend on this (I am a senior not very techy person).
creator: gfinley

title: Will my email inbox messages stay in Thunderbird even if I discontinue using my Office 365 email account?
content: I don't want to import all of my current inbox into my new email at SiteGround. But I want to be able to access the old emails if needed. I have my Office 365 inbox loaded fully into Thunderbird. If I delete my Office 365 exchange email at GoDaddy, will the emails still stay in my inbox on Thunderbird so I can access them as an archive?
creator: julie76

title: Albero struttura cartelle con Gmail
content:
Salve a tutti,

Era tanto che non usavo il mio account di GMail con Thunderbird, dall'ultima formattazione, solo ogni tanto ci andavo con il Browser, ma ieri mi sono deciso a collegarlo a Thunderbird. Nessun problema a farlo però, quando ho finito, ho visto che nell' albero delle cartelle sulla sinistra appare la cartella {GMAIL] con le sue sottocartelle tra le quali c'è Posta Inviata.

Mi ricordo che (parlo di forse due anni fa) avevo avuto lo stesso problema che però avevo risolto, se non mi sbaglio, con un plugin ma... non l'ho trovato e non ricordo come si chiamava (ieri ci ho perso due ore a cercare!).

Qualcuno mi può aiutare? Grazie mille a tutti.
creator: nathan.never

title: PROBLEMI CON INVIO ALLEGATI CON MAILMERGE
content: Salve, ho sempre usato thunderbird per inviare email a ind email diversi con allegati diversi presi da un foglio in excel, sembrerebbe che con l'ultimo aggiornamento gli allegati diversificati non vengono inseriti con mail merge indicando {{ALLEGATO}} nello spazio, mentre gli indirizzi email vengono presi correttamente dal foglio di excel. Rimango in attesa, grazie.

I'm sorry in and advance if this is my error but it was reasonably good prior to the supernova update. Can somebody offer help or is this a bug ? Picture of the window attached. Todays update (2nd March 2023) made no improvement. Thanks in advance for some help.

title: Text size
content:
When replying to a message that looks like plain text, the text-size function does not show in the compose window. Bold seems to display, but changing text size retains the default text size of the compose window.

In other words, if I reply with '86 HOD!' and select '86 HOD! Only the bolded characters display in the compose window; changing the physical size of the selected characters has no effect.

This also shows no text size change in the Sent folder.

title: Attach large mail folder as an attachment (filelink, etc)?
content:
I need to email a large thunderbird mail folder to someone on gmail.

Its too large to just attach all the messages in the folder directly as attachments. My first thought is to use filelink which I have never tried. However, as best I can determine there is no free, hassle free provider. I was hoping I could use my Google Drive or one One Drive accounts with filelink, but I don't see a provider and don't want to establish new cloud storage.

The person I'm sending to needs to look at the folder which contains emails with attachments within the gmail interface.

It happens that my thunderbird email is actually IMAP to gmail, but there doesn't seem to be a self contained way on gmail to share a mail folder (which I think they call labels).

Am I missing something.
creator: kmand

title: Email Account Setup
content:
I own my domain michael.net and Ipower hosts the domain. I have Windows live email and need to migrate to Thunderbird email.

My POP3: mail.michaelsrogers.net. SMPT: mail.michaelsrogers.net. This doesn't work in Thunder bird. Everything I have tried just does not work.

Anybody have any ideas of how I can set Thunder bird account?
creator: michael566

title: No Earthlink email after T-bird 102.8.0 update
content: After having used Thunderbird with my Earthlink email service for many, many years, we are suddenly unable to check for and download our emails. Notification area where it used to say "connecting to server", "checking password", "downloading 1 of ##" messages", etc remains blank. But status bar on lower right shows activity, then just times out with no emails downloaded. We can see there are emails on Earthlink server by using their web based interface. Seemingly at random times, email will eventually download into T-bird. But not when we manually check for new mail ourselves. Contacted Earthlink, checked all server settings. Restarted T-bird and computer. No change. The duration of this problem roughly corresponds to the most recent update to 102.8.0 on 2/17/23. I saw in release notes that 102.8.0 fixed what sounds like a very similar issue with Gmail accounts. Wondering if by fixing Gmail issue, they broke Earthlink? Any suggestions? Thanks.
creator: rlofbiz

title: Gmail with IMAP does not leave a copy on server
content: When I delete a file from my Inbox in Thunderbird, I want a copy to stay on Gmail. I used IMAP to configure the incoming and outcoming mail in Thunderbird, but it always moves every deleted file to trash in my Gmail.

title: Event reminder popups not working...
content:
Some event reminder popups aren't being displayed. There's no apparent reason as to which reminder popups will work properly, although the problem seems to occur mostly with event reminders dated in the future or with reminders that use a custom reminder date/time (e.g. 16 days prior to the event). If I can't depend on the reminder popups then the calendar feature is useless to me.

Also, another slight annoyance is that the events cannot be sort by date, it refuses to sort them in chronological order. FYI...sort by name works.
creator: x4n2t0x

title: remnant folders are re-created
content:
Background: Running 102.8.0 (64-bit) on Windows 11. Recently migrated to a new machine. In the past I used Mail Store application (https://www.mailstore.com) for backups, though it is not currently installed.

Issue: My Thunderbird keeps recreating local folders which may have had some use in the past but are no longer needed. These are "From {username}-Mail To" and "Sent-Mail To". Both remnants have subfolders "From {username}" which are empty. Refer attached screenshots.

Mitigation: I have removed them from Thunderbird UI, stopped Thunderbird, then removed the corresponding folders from the (Account Settings Local Directory) in the file system. Restarted Thunderbird and removed these folders from Trash. But after some time, they continue to be recreated.

Request: How can I delete these remnant folders permanently?
creator: wmclaxton

title: Not able to send email through Thunderbird
content: I am not able to send Email through my thunderbird but when I log through browser am able to do so. I created a new id to get rid of this but the same problem is happening in the new ID also.
